fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select a teammate every night. Next morning, they are immune to being killed by a lynch. (Unlike Guardian Angel's protection, the target can still be voted. If they would be lynched, they don't die but the day still ends immediately). When anyone from the Institution is lynched and you didn't protect them the night before, you will bring yourself up as the Scapegoat. You will die instead and the person who almost got lynched will get Basic Defense for 1 night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If there are multiple Scapegoats RNG which one takes the fall.
- If a player rolls Scapegoat and there is currently no Leader, turn said player into the Leader.
Goal - Kill all that would oppose you. (Wins with Institution and Neutral Benign).
Messages:
The Scapegoat has protected you! They will get you out of trouble if you get voted to be lynched today.
A Scapegoat saved \_\_\_\_\_\_ from the gallows~! The Town ends the discussion early and pursues the cloaked figure. (Target is lynched and saved)

fields.name: Abilities (cont.):
fields.value:
When \_\_\_\_\_\_ was about to be lynched, \_\_\_\_\_\_ came forward as a Scapegoat! They were lynched instead. (Institution member is lynched)
You were saved by the Scapegoat!~ You have Basic Defense for one night.
